reviews.review_msg: Brent is the best professor I have had at SFU. He is laid back and easy to understand. He also has a good sense of humour and is always willing to help.
A good course to take with Brent if you concentrate on HR study. I learned  so much from the course as well as him!

I don't usually rate my professors but Natalie is by far my favourite professor at SFU!! This is my second time taking a course with her and she is the absolute best. She is the most caring, approachable and sweetest human ever. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND

I enjoyed this class. Very little of the class was spent just listening to lecture. Lots of discussions and activities. Groups are formed and they present a chapter and case study 1 week in the semester. After each presentation Natalie ensures all important concepts are covered. Natalie is friendly, good at explaining concepts. Highly recommend.

Exceptional professor in SFU. She really shows her care to the class. Natalie is the professor that will always go above and beyond than just read the book off and give grades, she will instead bring up useful materials and news in current HR world and let the students be updated. If you are in HR, make sure you have a class with her!

Great prof and lectures are always interesting. Get ready to read and discuss case studies every week! Nearing the end of the semester, you will be preparing recommendations to help a real company mitigate/solve its issues.
